body.h1: Welcome to WSO2 Complex Event Processor (CEP) v1.0.0
body.p: WSO2 Complex Event Processor (WSO2 CEP) is to be your Complex Event Processing System (CEPS). Our ultimate goal is to provide you with the suitable capability of filtering events and generating new events according to your organization's decisions.

CEP 1.0.0 supports applying your organization' decisions on receiving event streams and generating new events on matching events.
WSO2 CEP 1.0.0 is developed on top of the revolutionary Carbon platform , and is based on the OSGi framework to achieve the better modularity for your Service Oriented Architecture (SOA). This also contains a lots of new features and many other optional components to customize the behavior of the server. Further, if you do not want any of the built in features, you can uninstall those features without any trouble. In other words, CEP can be customized to your SOA needs.
You can download this distribution from Project Download Page and give it a try.
Getting Started
Getting your complex event processing project off the ground with the WSO2 CEP is fairly simple.
